note:
I'm currently a Linux Engineer, that spends some time on AskUbuntu, because Ubuntu 10.10, Maverick Meerkat, won me over. I have been an Ubuntu user even after the rise, and fall, of the Unity Desktop Interface.

"You can teach a student a lesson for a day; but if you can teach him to learn by creating curiosity, he will continue the learning process as long as he lives." - Clay P. Bedford
